nodes.text: Tagoo was a male Patitite scout and warrior during the Clone Wars.

With fellow scout Jimba, Tagoo led a hunting party after the droids C-3PO and R2-D2, who crash landed on Patitite Pattuna in a BTL-A4 Y-wing assault starfighter/bomber. Tagoo and Jimba led the attack on the droids and overpowered them. With the droids captured, the Patitites called their leader, the Big Hay-Zu, to question him on what they should do with the droids. However, when the Big Hay-Zu was crushed to death by R2 by accident, Tagoo and the other Patitites cheered. Along with Jimba, Tagoo requested that C-3PO stay to be their new leader. He refused however, and instead helped them set up a democracy. The two droids left, leaving the Patitites to quarrel over future leadership.
Tagoo was voiced by Matthew Wood in the episode "Nomad Droids."
